description: This file defines a utility function 'error_response' for generating consistent JSON error responses in a Flask web application. It encapsulates details such as HTTP status code, message, error code, and optional field-specific errors.

methods.name: error_response( status_code: int, message: str, *, code: Optional[int] = None, errors: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
methods.description: Creates a standardized JSON error response with status code, message, optional error code, and additional error details.

ctags.name: error_response
ctags.signature: ( status_code: int, message: str, *, code: Optional[int] = None, errors: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None, )
